greeting.message:
Love has come to fruition
Korea and Russia
A man and a woman born in faraway countries meet
We became one and bore the fruit of true love
It would be a great pleasure
if you come to share this moment with us!

information.message:
â„¹ï¸ The meal will begin after the main ceremony in Part 1.
There will be a DJ party until 10pm for Part 2.
Guests are free to leave after the meal in case they have any commitments.

â„¹ï¸ There is no bridal waiting room.
The bride and groom will be welcoming guests as they arrive.

â„¹ï¸ Hanok Seonyungak is famous for its beautiful fall foliage.
You are welcome to arrive early to enjoy the scenery.

â„¹ï¸ Please let us know in advance if you will be attending so that we can set up seating arrangements.

â„¹ï¸ We respectfully ask guests to refrain from bringing flowers to help protect the environment.
